001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.hooks;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.service.RestService;
004import java.util.Map;
005import org.apache.logging.log4j.util.TriConsumer;
006
007/**
008 * Represents a single API hook implementation, providing the logic to execute
009 * before or after tests run.
010 *
011 * <p>Each {@code ApiHookFlow} must supply:
012 * <ul>
013 *   <li>a {@linkplain #flow() flow consumer} that is invoked with the REST service,
014 *       a shared parameters map, and any hook arguments, and</li>
015 *   <li>an {@linkplain #enumImpl() associated enum constant} identifying this hook.</li>
016 * </ul>
017 *
018 * @param <T> the enum type used to identify hook implementations
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021@SuppressWarnings("java:S1452")
022public interface ApiHookFlow<T extends Enum<T>> {
023
024   /**
025    * Returns the executable hook logic.
026    *
027    * <p>The returned {@link TriConsumer} is invoked for each hook
028    * with:
029    * <ul>
030    *   <li>a {@link RestService} instance for performing API calls,</li>
031    *   <li>a mutable {@link Map} into which the hook may write results or parameters, and</li>
032    *   <li>an array of {@link String} arguments defined on the {@code @ApiHook} annotation.</li>
033    * </ul>
034    *
035    * @return a three-argument consumer executing the hook flow
036    */
037   TriConsumer<RestService, Map<Object, Object>, String[]> flow();
038
039   /**
040    * Returns the enum constant that identifies this hook implementation.
041    *
042    * <p>This value is used reflectively to look up the correct
043    * {@code ApiHookFlow} based on the {@code type} attribute of {@code @ApiHook}.</p>
044    *
045    * @return the enum identifying this hook
046    */
047   T enumImpl();
048
049}
